composition: ['We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. The Green to Wear 2.0 standard aims to minimize the environmental impact of textile manufacturing. To do this, we have developed Inditex’s The List program which helps us guarantee both the purity of production processes and the health and safety of our garments. ', '100% cotton', 'Lower temperature washes and delicate spin cycles are gentler on garment, helping to maintain the color, shape and structure of the fabric. At the same time it reduces energy consumption that is used in care processes.']

composition: ['Care for water: produced using less water.We use the Join Life label for items that have been produced using technologies and raw materials that help us reduce the environmental impact of our products. ', 'These garments were produced using technologies that reduce water consumption in their production processes.The garment dyeing or washing processes require a higher consumption of water. The use of closed cycles that allow reuse of water or of technologies like machines of low bath ratio or bulk dyeing that reduce water consumption in these processes helps us preserve fresh water resources.', 'This product was made following the Join Life standard developed by Inditex Group and based on Life Cycle Analysis, an internationally standardized method that allows assessing the impacts of a product in the various phases of its production, use, and end of life. The use of closed cycles that allow reuse of water or of technologies like machines of low bath ratio or bulk dyeing that reduce water consumption in these processes helps us preserve fresh water resources.', 'This product was made following the Join Life standard developed by Inditex Group and based on Life Cycle Analysis, an internationally standardized method that allows assessing the impacts of a product in the various phases of its production, use, and end of life. To assess compliance with the standard, a program has been developed of audits performed by specialized external companies.', 'We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. The Green to Wear 2.0 standard aims to minimize the environmental impact of textile manufacturing. To do this, we have developed Inditex’s The List program which helps us guarantee both the purity of production processes and the health and safety of our garments. ', '100% cotton', '97% cotton · 3% elastane', 'Lower temperature washes and delicate spin cycles are gentler on garment, helping to maintain the color, shape and structure of the fabric. At the same time it reduces energy consumption that is used in care processes.']

composition: ['Care for fiber: at least 25% recycled cotton.We use the Join Life label for items that have been produced using technologies and raw materials that help us reduce the environmental impact of our products. ', 'Recycled cotton is obtained from cotton textile waste that are classified by type and color to then be shredded and transformed into new cotton fiber.The use of recycled cotton reduces the consumption of virgin raw material. By transforming cotton waste into a new recycled fiber, we avoid the growth of new cotton crops. Additionally, the production process uses less water, less energy, and generates less waste, helping us conserve the environment.', 'We only use recycled cotton certified by organizations that perform monitoring from origin through the final product. We are currently working with:Global Recycled Standard (GRS)Recycled Content Standard (RCS)', 'We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. The Green to Wear 2.0 standard aims to minimize the environmental impact of textile manufacturing. ', '100% cotton', 'Lower temperature washes and delicate spin cycles are gentler on garment, helping to maintain the color, shape and structure of the fabric. ', 'Ecologically grown cotton is grown using natural fertilizers and pesticides.The use of these natural growth methods is more respectful of water and of environmental biodiversity which allows farmers to integrate cotton crops with others that serve as food such as oranges, tomatoes, or turmeric, for example.Additionally, in ecologically grown cotton farms the use of genetically modified seeds is avoided, helping to conserve seed biodiversity and soil fertility.', 'We only use ecologically grown cotton certified by organizations that perform monitoring from raw material through the final product. We are currently working with:Organic Content Standard (OCS)Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS)', 'We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. The Green to Wear 2.0 standard aims to minimize the environmental impact of textile manufacturing. To do this, we have developed Inditex’s The List program which helps us guarantee both the purity of production processes and the health and safety of our garments. ', '100% cotton', 'Lower temperature washes and delicate spin cycles are gentler on garment, helping to maintain the color, shape and structure of the fabric. At the same time it reduces energy consumption that is used in care processes.']
title: BASIC V-NECK T-SHIRT
description: Full cut T-shirt with V-neck and short sleeves.

composition: ['Care for water: produced using less water.We use the Join Life label for items that have been produced using technologies and raw materials that help us reduce the environmental impact of our products. ', 'These garments were produced using technologies that reduce water consumption in their production processes.The garment dyeing or washing processes require a higher consumption of water. The use of closed cycles that allow reuse of water or of technologies like machines of low bath ratio or bulk dyeing that reduce water consumption in these processes helps us preserve fresh water resources.', 'This product was made following the Join Life standard developed by Inditex Group and based on Life Cycle Analysis, an internationally standardized method that allows assessing the impacts of a product in the various phases of its production, use, and end of life. composition: ['We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. The Green to Wear 2.0 standard aims to minimize the environmental impact of textile manufacturing. To do this, we have developed Inditex’s The List program which helps us guarantee both the purity of production processes and the health and safety of our garments. ', '100% polyester', 'Lower temperature washes and delicate spin cycles are gentler on garment, helping to maintain the color, shape and structure of the fabric. At the same time it reduces energy consumption that is used in care processes.']
title: PRINTED SEERSUCKER SHIRT
description: T-shirt with round neck and short sleeves. Chest patch pocket. Side vents at hem.

composition: ['Care for water: produced using less water.We use the Join Life label for items that have been produced using technologies and raw materials that help us reduce the environmental impact of our products. ', 'These garments were produced using technologies that reduce water consumption in their production processes.The garment dyeing or washing processes require a higher consumption of water. The use of closed cycles that allow reuse of water or of technologies like machines of low bath ratio or bulk dyeing that reduce water consumption in these processes helps us preserve fresh water resources.', 'This product was made following the Join Life standard developed by Inditex Group and based on Life Cycle Analysis, an internationally standardized method that allows assessing the impacts of a product in the various phases of its production, use, and end of life. To assess compliance with the standard, a program has been developed of audits performed by specialized external companies.', 'We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. The Green to Wear 2.0 standard aims to minimize the environmental impact of textile manufacturing. To do this, we have developed Inditex’s The List program which helps us guarantee both the purity of production processes and the health and safety of our garments. ', '100% cotton', 'Lower temperature washes and delicate spin cycles are gentler on garment, helping to maintain the color, shape and structure of the fabric. At the same time it reduces energy consumption that is used in care processes.']

title: COMBINATION PRINT T-SHIRT
description: Full cut round neck T-shirt with short sleeves. Contrasting print at front and back.

composition: ['Care for fiber: at least 65% ECOVERO™ Viscose.We use the Join Life label for items that have been produced using technologies and raw materials that help us reduce the environmental impact of our products. ', 'ECOVERO™ is a viscose material produced by Lenzing with raw materials and technology that reduce the impact of the fiber production processes. This fiber is obtained from wood from sustainably managed forests where trees are grown in a controlled manner. What\'s more, the manufacturer of this fiber is certified as "green shirt" in the Hot Button Report developed by the non-profit organization Canopy, thus guaranteeing the protection of old-growth and endangered forests.Additionally, technologies are used in its production process that comply with parameters established by the European Union of more responsible consumption and management of energy, water, and the reduction of CO2 emissions.', 'ECOVERO™ is certified by the EU Ecolabel, a label developed by the Directorate-General for Environment of the European Commission which verifies that production processes comply with strict environmental standards.In addition, the wood sourcing is controlled through collaboration with external organizations that verify compliance with our Forest Policy through an audit program, thereby guaranteeing that old-growth and endangered forests are respected.', 'We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. The Green to Wear 2.0 standard aims to minimize the environmental impact of textile manufacturing. To do this, we have developed Inditex’s The List program which helps us guarantee both the purity of production processes and the health and safety of our garments. ', '72% viscose · 28% polyamide', 'Knit garments are elastic, therefore it is important to wash them in low temperatures on gentle spin cycle, dry them on a flat surface, and then store folded. This way, we help them retain their shape and reduce energy consumption.']
title: FLOWY KNIT T-SHIRT
description: Knit T-shirt. Round neck and short sleeves. Rib trim.

composition: ['Care for fiber: at least 15% recycled cotton.We use the Join Life label for items that have been produced using technologies and raw materials that help us reduce the environmental impact of our products. ', 'Recycled cotton is obtained from cotton textile waste that are classified by type and color to then be shredded and transformed into new cotton fiber.The use of recycled cotton reduces the consumption of virgin raw material. By transforming cotton waste into a new recycled fiber, we avoid the growth of new cotton crops. Additionally, the production process uses less water, less energy, and generates less waste, helping us conserve the environment.', 'We only use recycled cotton certified by organizations that perform monitoring from origin through the final product. We are currently working with:Global Recycled Standard (GRS)Recycled Content Standard (RCS)', 'We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. The Green to Wear 2.0 standard aims to minimize the environmental impact of textile manufacturing. To do this, we have developed Inditex’s The List program which helps us guarantee both the purity of production processes and the health and safety of our garments. ', '100% cotton', 'Lower temperature washes and delicate spin cycles are gentler on garment, helping to maintain the color, shape and structure of the fabric. At the same time it reduces energy consumption that is used in care processes.']

composition: ['Care for fiber: at least 20% recycled cotton.We use the Join Life label for items that have been produced using technologies and raw materials that help us reduce the environmental impact of our products. ', 'Recycled cotton is obtained from cotton textile waste that are classified by type and color to then be shredded and transformed into new cotton fiber.The use of recycled cotton reduces the consumption of virgin raw material. Additionally, the production process uses less water, less energy, and generates less waste, helping us conserve the environment.', 'We only use recycled cotton certified by organizations that perform monitoring from origin through the final product. composition: ['We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. ', '100% cotton', 'Lower temperature washes and delicate spin cycles are gentler on garment, helping to maintain the color, shape and structure of the fabric. title: COMBINATION PRINT T-SHIRT
description: Full cut round neck T-shirt with short sleeves. Contrasting graphic prints at front and back.

composition: ['Care for water: produced using less water.We use the Join Life label for items that have been produced using technologies and raw materials that help us reduce the environmental impact of our products. ', 'These garments were produced using technologies that reduce water consumption in their production processes.The garment dyeing or washing processes require a higher consumption of water. The use of closed cycles that allow reuse of water or of technologies like machines of low bath ratio or bulk dyeing that reduce water consumption in these processes helps us preserve fresh water resources.', 'This product was made following the Join Life standard developed by Inditex Group and based on Life Cycle Analysis, an internationally standardized method that allows assessing the impacts of a product in the various phases of its production, use, and end of life. To assess compliance with the standard, a program has been developed of audits performed by specialized external companies.', 'We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. ', '90% cotton · 10% viscose', 'Lower temperature washes and delicate spin cycles are gentler on garment, helping to maintain the color, shape and structure of the fabric. composition: ['Care for fiber: 100% ecologically grown cotton.We use the Join Life label for items that have been produced using technologies and raw materials that help us reduce the environmental impact of our products. ', 'Ecologically grown cotton is grown using natural fertilizers and pesticides.The use of these natural growth methods is more respectful of water and of environmental biodiversity which allows farmers to integrate cotton crops with others that serve as food such as oranges, tomatoes, or turmeric, for example.Additionally, in ecologically grown cotton farms the use of genetically modified seeds is avoided, helping to conserve seed biodiversity and soil fertility.', 'We only use ecologically grown cotton certified by organizations that perform monitoring from raw material through the final product. We are currently working with:Organic Content Standard (OCS)Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS)', 'We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. The Green to Wear 2.0 standard aims to minimize the environmental impact of textile manufacturing. To do this, we have developed Inditex’s The List program which helps us guarantee both the purity of production processes and the health and safety of our garments. ', '100% cotton', 'Knit garments are elastic, therefore it is important to wash them in low temperatures on gentle spin cycle, dry them on a flat surface, and then store folded. This way, we help them retain their shape and reduce energy consumption.']
title: TEXT KNIT T-SHIRT
description: Knit T-shirt made of spun cotton fabric. Round neck and short sleeves. Contrasting embroidery at chest.

composition: ['Care for fiber: at least 20% recycled cotton.We use the Join Life label for items that have been produced using technologies and raw materials that help us reduce the environmental impact of our products. ', 'Recycled cotton is obtained from cotton textile waste that are classified by type and color to then be shredded and transformed into new cotton fiber.The use of recycled cotton reduces the consumption of virgin raw material. By transforming cotton waste into a new recycled fiber, we avoid the growth of new cotton crops. Additionally, the production process uses less water, less energy, and generates less waste, helping us conserve the environment.', 'We only use recycled cotton certified by organizations that perform monitoring from origin through the final product. We are currently working with:Global Recycled Standard (GRS)Recycled Content Standard (RCS)', 'We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. The Green to Wear 2.0 standard aims to minimize the environmental impact of textile manufacturing. description: Full cut round neck T-shirt with short sleeves.

composition: ['Care for fiber: at least 75% ECOVERO™ Viscose.We use the Join Life label for items that have been produced using technologies and raw materials that help us reduce the environmental impact of our products. ', 'ECOVERO™ is a viscose material produced by Lenzing with raw materials and technology that reduce the impact of the fiber production processes. This fiber is obtained from wood from sustainably managed forests where trees are grown in a controlled manner. What\'s more, the manufacturer of this fiber is certified as "green shirt" in the Hot Button Report developed by the non-profit organization Canopy, thus guaranteeing the protection of old-growth and endangered forests.Additionally, technologies are used in its production process that comply with parameters established by the European Union of more responsible consumption and management of energy, water, and the reduction of CO2 emissions.', 'ECOVERO™ is certified by the EU Ecolabel, a label developed by the Directorate-General for Environment of the European Commission which verifies that production processes comply with strict environmental standards.In addition, the wood sourcing is controlled through collaboration with external organizations that verify compliance with our Forest Policy through an audit program, thereby guaranteeing that old-growth and endangered forests are respected.', 'We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. The Green to Wear 2.0 standard aims to minimize the environmental impact of textile manufacturing. To do this, we have developed Inditex’s The List program which helps us guarantee both the purity of production processes and the health and safety of our garments. ', '81% viscose · 19% polyamide', 'Knit garments are elastic, therefore it is important to wash them in low temperatures on gentle spin cycle, dry them on a flat surface, and then store folded. This way, we help them retain their shape and reduce energy consumption.']
title: MOCK NECK KNIT SHIRT
description: Viscose blend knit shirt. Mock neck and short sleeves. Rib trim.

composition: ['Care for fiber: at least 50% ecologically grown cotton.We use the Join Life label for items that have been produced using technologies and raw materials that help us reduce the environmental impact of our products. composition: ['Care for fiber: at least 15% recycled cotton.We use the Join Life label for items that have been produced using technologies and raw materials that help us reduce the environmental impact of our products. ', 'Recycled cotton is obtained from cotton textile waste that are classified by type and color to then be shredded and transformed into new cotton fiber.The use of recycled cotton reduces the consumption of virgin raw material. By transforming cotton waste into a new recycled fiber, we avoid the growth of new cotton crops. Additionally, the production process uses less water, less energy, and generates less waste, helping us conserve the environment.', 'We only use recycled cotton certified by organizations that perform monitoring from origin through the final product. We are currently working with:Global Recycled Standard (GRS)Recycled Content Standard (RCS)', 'We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. The use of closed cycles that allow reuse of water or of technologies like machines of low bath ratio or bulk dyeing that reduce water consumption in these processes helps us preserve fresh water resources.', 'This product was made following the Join Life standard developed by Inditex Group and based on Life Cycle Analysis, an internationally standardized method that allows assessing the impacts of a product in the various phases of its production, use, and end of life. To assess compliance with the standard, a program has been developed of audits performed by specialized external companies.', 'We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. The Green to Wear 2.0 standard aims to minimize the environmental impact of textile manufacturing. To do this, we have developed Inditex’s The List program which helps us guarantee both the purity of production processes and the health and safety of our garments. ', '95% cotton · 5% elastane', '100% cotton', '100% cotton', 'Lower temperature washes and delicate spin cycles are gentler on garment, helping to maintain the color, shape and structure of the fabric. At the same time it reduces energy consumption that is used in care processes.']

composition: ['Care for fiber & water: at least 55% recycled polyamide.We use the Join Life label for items that have been produced using technologies and raw materials that help us reduce the environmental impact of our products. ', 'Recycled polyamide is produced from reclaimed fishing nets and nylon garments. They are classified and shredded. We are currently working with:Global Recycled Standard (GRS)Recycled Content Standard (RCS)', 'These garments were produced using technologies that reduce water consumption in their production processes.The garment dyeing or washing processes require a higher consumption of water. To do this, we have developed Inditex’s The List program which helps us guarantee both the purity of production processes and the health and safety of our garments. ', '95% nylon · 5% elastane', 'Wash your garments only when needed, as sometimes freshening them up is sufficient. Wash cycles slowly wear down fabrics. composition: ['Care for fiber: 100% TENCEL™ Lyocell.We use the Join Life label for items that have been produced using technologies and raw materials that help us reduce the environmental impact of our products. ', 'TENCEL™ Lyocell is a fiber produced by Lenzing with raw materials and technology that reduce the environmental impact of the production processes.This fiber is obtained from wood, mostly eucalyptus trees, from more sustainably managed forests where trees are grown in a controlled manner and with programs that guarantee their reforestation. What\'s more, the manufacturer of this fiber is certified as "green shirt" in the Hot Button Report developed by the non-profit organization Canopy, thus guaranteeing the protection of old-growth and endangered forests.Additionally, the production process is performed in a closed circuit that recovers water and 99% of chemicals. These technologies are used in its production process that comply with parameters established by the European Union of more responsible consumption and management of energy, water, and the reduction of CO2 emissions.', 'TENCEL™ Lyocell is certified by the EU Ecolabel, a label developed by the Directorate-General for Environment of the European Commission which verifies that production processes comply with strict environmental standards.In addition, the wood sourcing is controlled through collaboration with external organizations that verify compliance with our Forest Policy through an audit program, thereby guaranteeing that ancient and endangered forests are respected.', 'We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. The Green to Wear 2.0 standard aims to minimize the environmental impact of textile manufacturing. To do this, we have developed Inditex’s The List program which helps us guarantee both the purity of production processes and the health and safety of our garments. ', '100% lyocell', 'Wash your garments only when needed, as sometimes freshening them up is sufficient. Wash cycles slowly wear down fabrics. By reducing the amount of washing, we lengthen the life our garments and reduce water and energy consumption in their care.']

composition: ['Care for fiber & water: at least 45% transitional cotton & 25% ecologically grown cotton.We use the Join Life label for items that have been produced using technologies and raw materials that help us reduce the environmental impact of our products. ', 'This cotton is obtained during the transition process which a conventionally grown crop requires to achieve the organically grown certification. The support given to farmers during this process, known as transitional farming, is fundamental to fostering the creation of this type of crop.Additionally, even though they do not yet have the organically grown certification, they are produced following the same natural farming techniques, using fertilizers and pesticides and without the use of genetically modified seeds.These use of these natural farming techniques helps to preserve environmental biodiversity and fresh water resources.', 'We only use transitional cotton certified by organizations that perform monitoring from raw material through the final product. composition: ['Care for fiber & water: at least 55% ECOVERO™ Viscose.We use the Join Life label for items that have been produced using technologies and raw materials that help us reduce the environmental impact of our products. ', 'ECOVERO™ is a viscose material produced by Lenzing with raw materials and technology that reduce the impact of the fiber production processes. This fiber is obtained from wood from sustainably managed forests where trees are grown in a controlled manner. What\'s more, the manufacturer of this fiber is certified as "green shirt" in the Hot Button Report developed by the non-profit organization Canopy, thus guaranteeing the protection of old-growth and endangered forests.Additionally, technologies are used in its production process that comply with parameters established by the European Union of more responsible consumption and management of energy, water, and the reduction of CO2 emissions.', 'ECOVERO™ is certified by the EU Ecolabel, a label developed by the Directorate-General for Environment of the European Commission which verifies that production processes comply with strict environmental standards.In addition, the wood sourcing is controlled through collaboration with external organizations that verify compliance with our Forest Policy through an audit program, thereby guaranteeing that old-growth and endangered forests are respected.', 'These garments were produced using technologies that reduce water consumption in their production processes.The garment dyeing or washing processes require a higher consumption of water. The use of closed cycles that allow reuse of water or of technologies like machines of low bath ratio or bulk dyeing that reduce water consumption in these processes helps us preserve fresh water resources.', 'This product was made following the Join Life standard developed by Inditex Group and based on Life Cycle Analysis, an internationally standardized method that allows assessing the impacts of a product in the various phases of its production, use, and end of life. To assess compliance with the standard, a program has been developed of audits performed by specialized external companies.', 'We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. description: V-neck crop top with straps.

composition: ['Care for fiber & water: at least 55% recycled polyamide.We use the Join Life label for items that have been produced using technologies and raw materials that help us reduce the environmental impact of our products. ', 'Recycled polyamide is produced from reclaimed fishing nets and nylon garments. They are classified and shredded. Once shredded, the polyamide fibers are reclaimed and processed to create new recycled polyamide thread. As such, we are able to reclaim plastic waist and reduce the consumption of virgin raw material.Additionally, the production process uses less water, less energy, and generates less waste, helping us conserve the environment.', 'We only use recycled polyamide certified by organizations that perform monitoring from origin through the final product. We are currently working with:Global Recycled Standard (GRS)Recycled Content Standard (RCS)', 'These garments were produced using technologies that reduce water consumption in their production processes.The garment dyeing or washing processes require a higher consumption of water. The use of closed cycles that allow reuse of water or of technologies like machines of low bath ratio or bulk dyeing that reduce water consumption in these processes helps us preserve fresh water resources.', 'This product was made following the Join Life standard developed by Inditex Group and based on Life Cycle Analysis, an internationally standardized method that allows assessing the impacts of a product in the various phases of its production, use, and end of life. To assess compliance with the standard, a program has been developed of audits performed by specialized external companies.', 'We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. The Green to Wear 2.0 standard aims to minimize the environmental impact of textile manufacturing. To do this, we have developed Inditex’s The List program which helps us guarantee both the purity of production processes and the health and safety of our garments. ', '95% nylon · 5% elastane', 'Wash your garments only when needed, as sometimes freshening them up is sufficient. Wash cycles slowly wear down fabrics. By reducing the amount of washing, we lengthen the life our garments and reduce water and energy consumption in their care.']

', 'Ecologically grown cotton is grown using natural fertilizers and pesticides.The use of these natural growth methods is more respectful of water and of environmental biodiversity which allows farmers to integrate cotton crops with others that serve as food such as oranges, tomatoes, or turmeric, for example.Additionally, in ecologically grown cotton farms the use of genetically modified seeds is avoided, helping to conserve seed biodiversity and soil fertility.', 'We only use ecologically grown cotton certified by organizations that perform monitoring from raw material through the final product. We are currently working with:Organic Content Standard (OCS)Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS)', 'These garments were produced using technologies that reduce water consumption in their production processes.The garment dyeing or washing processes require a higher consumption of water. The use of closed cycles that allow reuse of water or of technologies like machines of low bath ratio or bulk dyeing that reduce water consumption in these processes helps us preserve fresh water resources.', 'This product was made following the Join Life standard developed by Inditex Group and based on Life Cycle Analysis, an internationally standardized method that allows assessing the impacts of a product in the various phases of its production, use, and end of life. To assess compliance with the standard, a program has been developed of audits performed by specialized external companies.', 'We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. The Green to Wear 2.0 standard aims to minimize the environmental impact of textile manufacturing. To do this, we have developed Inditex’s The List program which helps us guarantee both the purity of production processes and the health and safety of our garments. ', '100% cotton', 'Lower temperature washes and delicate spin cycles are gentler on garment, helping to maintain the color, shape and structure of the fabric. At the same time it reduces energy consumption that is used in care processes.']

title: CROP TOP
description: Round neck T-shirt with short sleeves.

composition: ['Care for fiber: at least 35% recycled polyester.We use the Join Life label for items that have been produced using technologies and raw materials that help us reduce the environmental impact of our products. ', 'Recycled polyester is made from recycled PET plastic like that from plastic bottles.Every time you place a plastic bottle in the recycling bin, it is taken to a waste sorting and classification plant. There, the different types of plastics are separated for the correct destination. PET plastic is cleaned, shredded, and recycled into new recycled polyester fiber.As such, we are able to give new life to plastic waste and reduce the consumption of virgin raw material by means of a process that consumes less water, less energy, and creates less waste.Regenerated thread has characteristics similar to virgin polyester; it is strong, resistant, long-lasting and can always be recycled again.', 'We only use recycled polyester certified by organizations that perform monitoring from origin through the final product. We are currently working with:Global Recycled Standard (GRS)Recycled Content Standard (RCS)', 'We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. The Green to Wear 2.0 standard aims to minimize the environmental impact of textile manufacturing. To do this, we have developed Inditex’s The List program which helps us guarantee both the purity of production processes and the health and safety of our garments. ', '96% polyester · 4% elastane', 'Lower temperature washes and delicate spin cycles are gentler on garment, helping to maintain the color, shape and structure of the fabric. At the same time it reduces energy consumption that is used in care processes.']

composition: ['Care for fiber & water: at least 100% TENCEL™ Lyocell.We use the Join Life label for items that have been produced using technologies and raw materials that help us reduce the environmental impact of our products. ', 'TENCEL™ Lyocell is a fiber produced by Lenzing with raw materials and technology that reduce the environmental impact of the production processes.This fiber is obtained from wood, mostly eucalyptus trees, from more sustainably managed forests where trees are grown in a controlled manner and with programs that guarantee their reforestation. What\'s more, the manufacturer of this fiber is certified as "green shirt" in the Hot Button Report developed by the non-profit organization Canopy, thus guaranteeing the protection of old-growth and endangered forests.Additionally, the production process is performed in a closed circuit that recovers water and 99% of chemicals. These technologies are used in its production process that comply with parameters established by the European Union of more responsible consumption and management of energy, water, and the reduction of CO2 emissions.', 'TENCEL™ Lyocell is certified by the EU Ecolabel, a label developed by the Directorate-General for Environment of the European Commission which verifies that production processes comply with strict environmental standards.In addition, the wood sourcing is controlled through collaboration with external organizations that verify compliance with our Forest Policy through an audit program, thereby guaranteeing that ancient and endangered forests are respected.', 'These garments were produced using technologies that reduce water consumption in their production processes.The garment dyeing or washing processes require a higher consumption of water. The use of closed cycles that allow reuse of water or of technologies like machines of low bath ratio or bulk dyeing that reduce water consumption in these processes helps us preserve fresh water resources.', 'This product was made following the Join Life standard developed by Inditex Group and based on Life Cycle Analysis, an internationally standardized method that allows assessing the impacts of a product in the various phases of its production, use, and end of life. To assess compliance with the standard, a program has been developed of audits performed by specialized external companies.', 'We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. The Green to Wear 2.0 standard aims to minimize the environmental impact of textile manufacturing. To do this, we have developed Inditex’s The List program which helps us guarantee both the purity of production processes and the health and safety of our garments. ', '100% lyocell', 'Wash your garments only when needed, as sometimes freshening them up is sufficient. Wash cycles slowly wear down fabrics. By reducing the amount of washing, we lengthen the life our garments and reduce water and energy consumption in their care.']

', '93% viscose · 7% polyamide', 'Lower temperature washes and delicate spin cycles are gentler on garment, helping to maintain the color, shape and structure of the fabric. description: Full cut T-shirt with round neck and short sleeves. Asymmetric hem.

composition: ['Care for fiber & water: at least 55% REFIBRA™ Lyocell & 25% ecologically grown cotton.We use the Join Life label for items that have been produced using technologies and raw materials that help us reduce the environmental impact of our products. ', 'REFIBRA™ Lyocell is a technology that turns waste into a resource: it makes it possible to add recovered cotton to the TENCEL™ Lyocell production process. This fiber is a combination of recycled cotton and wood from more sustainably managed forests where trees are grown in a controlled manner and with programs that guarantee reforestation. The use of recycled materials reduces the production of raw virgin materials and with it the use of water, energy, and natural resources. The manufacturer of this fiber is certified as "green shirt" in the Hot Button Report developed by the non-profit organization Canopy, thus guaranteeing that the wood is sourced from sources that respect old-growth and endangered forests.Manufactured by Lenzing, it is produced in a closed circuit that recovers water and 99% of chemicals. Additionally, technologies are used in its production process that comply with parameters established by the European Union of more responsible consumption and management of energy, water, and the reduction of CO2 emissions.', "REFIBRA™ Lyocell is certified by the EU Ecolabel, a label developed by the Directorate-General for Environment of the European Commission which verifies that production processes comply with strict environmental standards. In addition, the wood sourcing is controlled through collaboration with external organizations that verify compliance with our Forest Policy through an audit program, thereby guaranteeing that ancient and endangered forests are respected.What's more, we work with organizations that monitor the origin of recycled of recycled materials, such as the Global Recycled Standard (GRS) or Recycled Content Standard (RCS).", 'Ecologically grown cotton is grown using natural fertilizers and pesticides.The use of these natural growth methods is more respectful of water and of environmental biodiversity which allows farmers to integrate cotton crops with others that serve as food such as oranges, tomatoes, or turmeric, for example.Additionally, in ecologically grown cotton farms the use of genetically modified seeds is avoided, helping to conserve seed biodiversity and soil fertility.', 'We only use ecologically grown cotton certified by organizations that perform monitoring from raw material through the final product. We are currently working with:Organic Content Standard (OCS)Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS)', 'These garments were produced using technologies that reduce water consumption in their production processes.The garment dyeing or washing processes require a higher consumption of water. The use of closed cycles that allow reuse of water or of technologies like machines of low bath ratio or bulk dyeing that reduce water consumption in these processes helps us preserve fresh water resources.', 'This product was made following the Join Life standard developed by Inditex Group and based on Life Cycle Analysis, an internationally standardized method that allows assessing the impacts of a product in the various phases of its production, use, and end of life. To assess compliance with the standard, a program has been developed of audits performed by specialized external companies.', 'We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. The Green to Wear 2.0 standard aims to minimize the environmental impact of textile manufacturing. To do this, we have developed Inditex’s The List program which helps us guarantee both the purity of production processes and the health and safety of our garments. ', '55% lyocell · 24% cotton · 21% wool · 0% other fibres', 'Wash your garments only when needed, as sometimes freshening them up is sufficient. Wash cycles slowly wear down fabrics. By reducing the amount of washing, we lengthen the life our garments and reduce water and energy consumption in their care.']

composition: ['Care for fiber: at least 25% recycled polyester.We use the Join Life label for items that have been produced using technologies and raw materials that help us reduce the environmental impact of our products. ', 'Recycled polyester is made from recycled PET plastic like that from plastic bottles.Every time you place a plastic bottle in the recycling bin, it is taken to a waste sorting and classification plant. There, the different types of plastics are separated for the correct destination. PET plastic is cleaned, shredded, and recycled into new recycled polyester fiber.As such, we are able to give new life to plastic waste and reduce the consumption of virgin raw material by means of a process that consumes less water, less energy, and creates less waste.Regenerated thread has characteristics similar to virgin polyester; it is strong, resistant, long-lasting and can always be recycled again.', 'We only use recycled polyester certified by organizations that perform monitoring from origin through the final product. We are currently working with:Global Recycled Standard (GRS)Recycled Content Standard (RCS)', 'We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. The Green to Wear 2.0 standard aims to minimize the environmental impact of textile manufacturing. To do this, we have developed Inditex’s The List program which helps us guarantee both the purity of production processes and the health and safety of our garments. ', '53% viscose · 47% polyester', 'Lower temperature washes and delicate spin cycles are gentler on garment, helping to maintain the color, shape and structure of the fabric. At the same time it reduces energy consumption that is used in care processes.']

composition: ['Care for fiber & water: at least 50% transitional cotton.We use the Join Life label for items that have been produced using technologies and raw materials that help us reduce the environmental impact of our products. ', 'This cotton is obtained during the transition process which a conventionally grown crop requires to achieve the organically grown certification. The support given to farmers during this process, known as transitional farming, is fundamental to fostering the creation of this type of crop.Additionally, even though they do not yet have the organically grown certification, they are produced following the same natural farming techniques, using fertilizers and pesticides and without the use of genetically modified seeds.These use of these natural farming techniques helps to preserve environmental biodiversity and fresh water resources.', 'We only use transitional cotton certified by organizations that perform monitoring from raw material through the final product. We are currently working with:Organic Content Standard (OCS)Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS)', 'These garments were produced using technologies that reduce water consumption in their production processes.The garment dyeing or washing processes require a higher consumption of water. The use of closed cycles that allow reuse of water or of technologies like machines of low bath ratio or bulk dyeing that reduce water consumption in these processes helps us preserve fresh water resources.', 'This product was made following the Join Life standard developed by Inditex Group and based on Life Cycle Analysis, an internationally standardized method that allows assessing the impacts of a product in the various phases of its production, use, and end of life. To assess compliance with the standard, a program has been developed of audits performed by specialized external companies.', 'We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. The Green to Wear 2.0 standard aims to minimize the environmental impact of textile manufacturing. To do this, we have developed Inditex’s The List program which helps us guarantee both the purity of production processes and the health and safety of our garments. ', '50% cotton · 30% wool · 20% polyamide', 'Wash your garments only when needed, as sometimes freshening them up is sufficient. Wash cycles slowly wear down fabrics. By reducing the amount of washing, we lengthen the life our garments and reduce water and energy consumption in their care.']

composition: ['Care for fiber & water: at least 95% transitional cotton.We use the Join Life label for items that have been produced using technologies and raw materials that help us reduce the environmental impact of our products. ', 'This cotton is obtained during the transition process which a conventionally grown crop requires to achieve the organically grown certification. The support given to farmers during this process, known as transitional farming, is fundamental to fostering the creation of this type of crop.Additionally, even though they do not yet have the organically grown certification, they are produced following the same natural farming techniques, using fertilizers and pesticides and without the use of genetically modified seeds.These use of these natural farming techniques helps to preserve environmental biodiversity and fresh water resources.', 'We only use transitional cotton certified by organizations that perform monitoring from raw material through the final product. We are currently working with:Organic Content Standard (OCS)Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS)', 'These garments were produced using technologies that reduce water consumption in their production processes.The garment dyeing or washing processes require a higher consumption of water. The use of closed cycles that allow reuse of water or of technologies like machines of low bath ratio or bulk dyeing that reduce water consumption in these processes helps us preserve fresh water resources.', 'This product was made following the Join Life standard developed by Inditex Group and based on Life Cycle Analysis, an internationally standardized method that allows assessing the impacts of a product in the various phases of its production, use, and end of life. To assess compliance with the standard, a program has been developed of audits performed by specialized external companies.', 'We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. The Green to Wear 2.0 standard aims to minimize the environmental impact of textile manufacturing. To do this, we have developed Inditex’s The List program which helps us guarantee both the purity of production processes and the health and safety of our garments. ', '96% cotton · 4% elastane', '100% cotton', 'Lower temperature washes and delicate spin cycles are gentler on garment, helping to maintain the color, shape and structure of the fabric. At the same time it reduces energy consumption that is used in care processes.']

composition: ['We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. The Green to Wear 2.0 standard aims to minimize the environmental impact of textile manufacturing. To do this, we have developed Inditex’s The List program which helps us guarantee both the purity of production processes and the health and safety of our garments. ', '71% polyester · 29% cotton', '77% polyester · 21% cotton · 2% elastane', 'Lower temperature washes and delicate spin cycles are gentler on garment, helping to maintain the color, shape and structure of the fabric. At the same time it reduces energy consumption that is used in care processes.']
title: SOFT TOP
description: Sleeveless top with high collar.

composition: ['Care for fiber: 100% TENCEL™ Lyocell.We use the Join Life label for items that have been produced using technologies and raw materials that help us reduce the environmental impact of our products. ', 'TENCEL™ Lyocell is a fiber produced by Lenzing with raw materials and technology that reduce the environmental impact of the production processes.This fiber is obtained from wood, mostly eucalyptus trees, from more sustainably managed forests where trees are grown in a controlled manner and with programs that guarantee their reforestation. What\'s more, the manufacturer of this fiber is certified as "green shirt" in the Hot Button Report developed by the non-profit organization Canopy, thus guaranteeing the protection of old-growth and endangered forests.Additionally, the production process is performed in a closed circuit that recovers water and 99% of chemicals. These technologies are used in its production process that comply with parameters established by the European Union of more responsible consumption and management of energy, water, and the reduction of CO2 emissions.', 'TENCEL™ Lyocell is certified by the EU Ecolabel, a label developed by the Directorate-General for Environment of the European Commission which verifies that production processes comply with strict environmental standards.In addition, the wood sourcing is controlled through collaboration with external organizations that verify compliance with our Forest Policy through an audit program, thereby guaranteeing that ancient and endangered forests are respected.', 'We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. The Green to Wear 2.0 standard aims to minimize the environmental impact of textile manufacturing. To do this, we have developed Inditex’s The List program which helps us guarantee both the purity of production processes and the health and safety of our garments. ', '100% lyocell', 'Wash your garments only when needed, as sometimes freshening them up is sufficient. Wash cycles slowly wear down fabrics. By reducing the amount of washing, we lengthen the life our garments and reduce water and energy consumption in their care.']
title: CUT OUT T-SHIRT
description: Round neck T-shirt with short sleeves. Front opening.

composition: ['Care for fiber: at least 50% transitional cotton.We use the Join Life label for items that have been produced using technologies and raw materials that help us reduce the environmental impact of our products. ', 'This cotton is obtained during the transition process which a conventionally grown crop requires to achieve the organically grown certification. The support given to farmers during this process, known as transitional farming, is fundamental to fostering the creation of this type of crop.Additionally, even though they do not yet have the organically grown certification, they are produced following the same natural farming techniques, using fertilizers and pesticides and without the use of genetically modified seeds.These use of these natural farming techniques helps to preserve environmental biodiversity and fresh water resources.', 'We only use transitional cotton certified by organizations that perform monitoring from raw material through the final product. We are currently working with:Organic Content Standard (OCS)Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS)', 'We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. The Green to Wear 2.0 standard aims to minimize the environmental impact of textile manufacturing. To do this, we have developed Inditex’s The List program which helps us guarantee both the purity of production processes and the health and safety of our garments. ', '100% cotton', 'Lower temperature washes and delicate spin cycles are gentler on garment, helping to maintain the color, shape and structure of the fabric. At the same time it reduces energy consumption that is used in care processes.']

composition: ['Care for fiber: at least 30% recycled polyester.We use the Join Life label for items that have been produced using technologies and raw materials that help us reduce the environmental impact of our products. ', 'Recycled polyester is made from recycled PET plastic like that from plastic bottles.Every time you place a plastic bottle in the recycling bin, it is taken to a waste sorting and classification plant. There, the different types of plastics are separated for the correct destination. PET plastic is cleaned, shredded, and recycled into new recycled polyester fiber.As such, we are able to give new life to plastic waste and reduce the consumption of virgin raw material by means of a process that consumes less water, less energy, and creates less waste.Regenerated thread has characteristics similar to virgin polyester; it is strong, resistant, long-lasting and can always be recycled again.', 'We only use recycled polyester certified by organizations that perform monitoring from origin through the final product. We are currently working with:Global Recycled Standard (GRS)Recycled Content Standard (RCS)', 'We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. The Green to Wear 2.0 standard aims to minimize the environmental impact of textile manufacturing. To do this, we have developed Inditex’s The List program which helps us guarantee both the purity of production processes and the health and safety of our garments. ', '70% nylon · 30% polyester', 'Wash your garments only when needed, as sometimes freshening them up is sufficient. Wash cycles slowly wear down fabrics. By reducing the amount of washing, we lengthen the life our garments and reduce water and energy consumption in their care.']

composition: ['Care for fiber: at least 55% TENCEL™ Lyocell & 30% REFIBRA™ Lyocell.We use the Join Life label for items that have been produced using technologies and raw materials that help us reduce the environmental impact of our products. ', 'Recycled cotton is obtained from cotton textile waste that are classified by type and color to then be shredded and transformed into new cotton fiber.The use of recycled cotton reduces the consumption of virgin raw material. By transforming cotton waste into a new recycled fiber, we avoid the growth of new cotton crops. Additionally, the production process uses less water, less energy, and generates less waste, helping us conserve the environment.', 'We only use recycled cotton certified by organizations that perform monitoring from origin through the final product. We are currently working with:Global Recycled Standard (GRS)Recycled Content Standard (RCS)', 'Recycled polyester is made from recycled PET plastic like that from plastic bottles.Every time you place a plastic bottle in the recycling bin, it is taken to a waste sorting and classification plant. There, the different types of plastics are separated for the correct destination. PET plastic is cleaned, shredded, and recycled into new recycled polyester fiber.As such, we are able to give new life to plastic waste and reduce the consumption of virgin raw material by means of a process that consumes less water, less energy, and creates less waste.Regenerated thread has characteristics similar to virgin polyester; it is strong, resistant, long-lasting and can always be recycled again.', 'We only use recycled polyester certified by organizations that perform monitoring from origin through the final product. We are currently working with:Global Recycled Standard (GRS)Recycled Content Standard (RCS)', 'TENCEL™ Lyocell is a fiber produced by Lenzing with raw materials and technology that reduce the environmental impact of the production processes.This fiber is obtained from wood, mostly eucalyptus trees, from more sustainably managed forests where trees are grown in a controlled manner and with programs that guarantee their reforestation. What\'s more, the manufacturer of this fiber is certified as "green shirt" in the Hot Button Report developed by the non-profit organization Canopy, thus guaranteeing the protection of old-growth and endangered forests.Additionally, the production process is performed in a closed circuit that recovers water and 99% of chemicals. These technologies are used in its production process that comply with parameters established by the European Union of more responsible consumption and management of energy, water, and the reduction of CO2 emissions.', 'TENCEL™ Lyocell is certified by the EU Ecolabel, a label developed by the Directorate-General for Environment of the European Commission which verifies that production processes comply with strict environmental standards.In addition, the wood sourcing is controlled through collaboration with external organizations that verify compliance with our Forest Policy through an audit program, thereby guaranteeing that ancient and endangered forests are respected.', 'REFIBRA™ Lyocell is a technology that turns waste into a resource: it makes it possible to add recovered cotton to the TENCEL™ Lyocell production process. This fiber is a combination of recycled cotton and wood from more sustainably managed forests where trees are grown in a controlled manner and with programs that guarantee reforestation. The use of recycled materials reduces the production of raw virgin materials and with it the use of water, energy, and natural resources. The manufacturer of this fiber is certified as "green shirt" in the Hot Button Report developed by the non-profit organization Canopy, thus guaranteeing that the wood is sourced from sources that respect old-growth and endangered forests.Manufactured by Lenzing, it is produced in a closed circuit that recovers water and 99% of chemicals. Additionally, technologies are used in its production process that comply with parameters established by the European Union of more responsible consumption and management of energy, water, and the reduction of CO2 emissions.', "REFIBRA™ Lyocell is certified by the EU Ecolabel, a label developed by the Directorate-General for Environment of the European Commission which verifies that production processes comply with strict environmental standards. In addition, the wood sourcing is controlled through collaboration with external organizations that verify compliance with our Forest Policy through an audit program, thereby guaranteeing that ancient and endangered forests are respected.What's more, we work with organizations that monitor the origin of recycled of recycled materials, such as the Global Recycled Standard (GRS) or Recycled Content Standard (RCS).", 'We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. The Green to Wear 2.0 standard aims to minimize the environmental impact of textile manufacturing. To do this, we have developed Inditex’s The List program which helps us guarantee both the purity of production processes and the health and safety of our garments. ', '93% lyocell · 7% polyester', 'Wash your garments only when needed, as sometimes freshening them up is sufficient. Wash cycles slowly wear down fabrics. By reducing the amount of washing, we lengthen the life our garments and reduce water and energy consumption in their care.']

PET plastic is cleaned, shredded, and recycled into new recycled polyester fiber.As such, we are able to give new life to plastic waste and reduce the consumption of virgin raw material by means of a process that consumes less water, less energy, and creates less waste.Regenerated thread has characteristics similar to virgin polyester; it is strong, resistant, long-lasting and can always be recycled again.', 'We only use recycled polyester certified by organizations that perform monitoring from origin through the final product. We are currently working with:Global Recycled Standard (GRS)Recycled Content Standard (RCS)', 'We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. The Green to Wear 2.0 standard aims to minimize the environmental impact of textile manufacturing. To do this, we have developed Inditex’s The List program which helps us guarantee both the purity of production processes and the health and safety of our garments. ', '92% polyester · 8% elastane', '100% cotton', 'Lower temperature washes and delicate spin cycles are gentler on garment, helping to maintain the color, shape and structure of the fabric. At the same time it reduces energy consumption that is used in care processes.']
title: BUSTIER CROP TOP
description: Crop top with notched squared neckline and straps.

composition: ['Care for fiber & water: at least 55% recycled polyamide.We use the Join Life label for items that have been produced using technologies and raw materials that help us reduce the environmental impact of our products. ', 'Recycled polyamide is produced from reclaimed fishing nets and nylon garments. They are classified and shredded. Once shredded, the polyamide fibers are reclaimed and processed to create new recycled polyamide thread. As such, we are able to reclaim plastic waist and reduce the consumption of virgin raw material.Additionally, the production process uses less water, less energy, and generates less waste, helping us conserve the environment.', 'We only use recycled polyamide certified by organizations that perform monitoring from origin through the final product. We are currently working with:Global Recycled Standard (GRS)Recycled Content Standard (RCS)', 'These garments were produced using technologies that reduce water consumption in their production processes.The garment dyeing or washing processes require a higher consumption of water. The use of closed cycles that allow reuse of water or of technologies like machines of low bath ratio or bulk dyeing that reduce water consumption in these processes helps us preserve fresh water resources.', 'This product was made following the Join Life standard developed by Inditex Group and based on Life Cycle Analysis, an internationally standardized method that allows assessing the impacts of a product in the various phases of its production, use, and end of life. To assess compliance with the standard, a program has been developed of audits performed by specialized external companies.', 'We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. The Green to Wear 2.0 standard aims to minimize the environmental impact of textile manufacturing. To do this, we have developed Inditex’s The List program which helps us guarantee both the purity of production processes and the health and safety of our garments. ', '95% nylon · 5% elastane', 'Wash your garments only when needed, as sometimes freshening them up is sufficient. Wash cycles slowly wear down fabrics. ', 'TENCEL™ Lyocell is a fiber produced by Lenzing with raw materials and technology that reduce the environmental impact of the production processes.This fiber is obtained from wood, mostly eucalyptus trees, from more sustainably managed forests where trees are grown in a controlled manner and with programs that guarantee their reforestation. What\'s more, the manufacturer of this fiber is certified as "green shirt" in the Hot Button Report developed by the non-profit organization Canopy, thus guaranteeing the protection of old-growth and endangered forests.Additionally, the production process is performed in a closed circuit that recovers water and 99% of chemicals. These technologies are used in its production process that comply with parameters established by the European Union of more responsible consumption and management of energy, water, and the reduction of CO2 emissions.', 'TENCEL™ Lyocell is certified by the EU Ecolabel, a label developed by the Directorate-General for Environment of the European Commission which verifies that production processes comply with strict environmental standards.In addition, the wood sourcing is controlled through collaboration with external organizations that verify compliance with our Forest Policy through an audit program, thereby guaranteeing that ancient and endangered forests are respected.', 'We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. The Green to Wear 2.0 standard aims to minimize the environmental impact of textile manufacturing. To do this, we have developed Inditex’s The List program which helps us guarantee both the purity of production processes and the health and safety of our garments. ', '100% lyocell', 'Wash your garments only when needed, as sometimes freshening them up is sufficient. Wash cycles slowly wear down fabrics. ', 'Ecologically grown cotton is grown using natural fertilizers and pesticides.The use of these natural growth methods is more respectful of water and of environmental biodiversity which allows farmers to integrate cotton crops with others that serve as food such as oranges, tomatoes, or turmeric, for example.Additionally, in ecologically grown cotton farms the use of genetically modified seeds is avoided, helping to conserve seed biodiversity and soil fertility.', 'We only use ecologically grown cotton certified by organizations that perform monitoring from raw material through the final product. We are currently working with:Organic Content Standard (OCS)Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS)', 'These garments were produced using technologies that reduce water consumption in their production processes.The garment dyeing or washing processes require a higher consumption of water. The use of closed cycles that allow reuse of water or of technologies like machines of low bath ratio or bulk dyeing that reduce water consumption in these processes helps us preserve fresh water resources.', 'This product was made following the Join Life standard developed by Inditex Group and based on Life Cycle Analysis, an internationally standardized method that allows assessing the impacts of a product in the various phases of its production, use, and end of life. To assess compliance with the standard, a program has been developed of audits performed by specialized external companies.', 'We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. The Green to Wear 2.0 standard aims to minimize the environmental impact of textile manufacturing. To do this, we have developed Inditex’s The List program which helps us guarantee both the purity of production processes and the health and safety of our garments. ', '100% cotton', 'Lower temperature washes and delicate spin cycles are gentler on garment, helping to maintain the color, shape and structure of the fabric. At the same time it reduces energy consumption that is used in care processes.']

composition: ['Care for fiber & water: at least 50% viscose Join Life.We use the Join Life label for items that have been produced using technologies and raw materials that help us reduce the environmental impact of our products. ', 'Viscose Join Life is sourced from more sustainably managed forests with controlled tree growth, guaranteeing respect for primary and protected forests, and with programs that guarantee reforestation. ', 'This product was made following the Join Life standard developed by Inditex Group and based on Life Cycle Analysis, an internationally standardized method that allows assessing the impacts of a product in the various phases of its production, use, and end of life. To do this, we have developed Inditex’s The List program which helps us guarantee both the purity of production processes and the health and safety of our garments. ', '50% viscose · 28% polyester · 22% nylon', 'Wash your garments only when needed, as sometimes freshening them up is sufficient. Wash cycles slowly wear down fabrics. composition: ['Care for fiber: at least 25% recycled polyester.We use the Join Life label for items that have been produced using technologies and raw materials that help us reduce the environmental impact of our products. ', 'Recycled polyester is made from recycled PET plastic like that from plastic bottles.Every time you place a plastic bottle in the recycling bin, it is taken to a waste sorting and classification plant. There, the different types of plastics are separated for the correct destination. PET plastic is cleaned, shredded, and recycled into new recycled polyester fiber.As such, we are able to give new life to plastic waste and reduce the consumption of virgin raw material by means of a process that consumes less water, less energy, and creates less waste.Regenerated thread has characteristics similar to virgin polyester; it is strong, resistant, long-lasting and can always be recycled again.', 'We only use recycled polyester certified by organizations that perform monitoring from origin through the final product. We are currently working with:Global Recycled Standard (GRS)Recycled Content Standard (RCS)', 'We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. The Green to Wear 2.0 standard aims to minimize the environmental impact of textile manufacturing. To do this, we have developed Inditex’s The List program which helps us guarantee both the purity of production processes and the health and safety of our garments. ', '69% polyester · 23% viscose · 8% elastane', 'Lower temperature washes and delicate spin cycles are gentler on garment, helping to maintain the color, shape and structure of the fabric. At the same time it reduces energy consumption that is used in care processes.']

title: SEAMLESS CROP TOP
description: LIMITLESS CONTOUR COLLECTIONCrop top with crew neck and short sleeves.

composition: ['Care for fiber: at least 45% ECOVERO™ Viscose & 30% TENCEL™ Lyocell.We use the Join Life label for items that have been produced using technologies and raw materials that help us reduce the environmental impact of our products. ', 'ECOVERO™ is a viscose material produced by Lenzing with raw materials and technology that reduce the impact of the fiber production processes. This fiber is obtained from wood from sustainably managed forests where trees are grown in a controlled manner. What\'s more, the manufacturer of this fiber is certified as "green shirt" in the Hot Button Report developed by the non-profit organization Canopy, thus guaranteeing the protection of old-growth and endangered forests.Additionally, technologies are used in its production process that comply with parameters established by the European Union of more responsible consumption and management of energy, water, and the reduction of CO2 emissions.', 'ECOVERO™ is certified by the EU Ecolabel, a label developed by the Directorate-General for Environment of the European Commission which verifies that production processes comply with strict environmental standards.In addition, the wood sourcing is controlled through collaboration with external organizations that verify compliance with our Forest Policy through an audit program, thereby guaranteeing that old-growth and endangered forests are respected.', 'TENCEL™ Lyocell is a fiber produced by Lenzing with raw materials and technology that reduce the environmental impact of the production processes.This fiber is obtained from wood, mostly eucalyptus trees, from more sustainably managed forests where trees are grown in a controlled manner and with programs that guarantee their reforestation. What\'s more, the manufacturer of this fiber is certified as "green shirt" in the Hot Button Report developed by the non-profit organization Canopy, thus guaranteeing the protection of old-growth and endangered forests.Additionally, the production process is performed in a closed circuit that recovers water and 99% of chemicals. These technologies are used in its production process that comply with parameters established by the European Union of more responsible consumption and management of energy, water, and the reduction of CO2 emissions.', 'TENCEL™ Lyocell is certified by the EU Ecolabel, a label developed by the Directorate-General for Environment of the European Commission which verifies that production processes comply with strict environmental standards.In addition, the wood sourcing is controlled through collaboration with external organizations that verify compliance with our Forest Policy through an audit program, thereby guaranteeing that ancient and endangered forests are respected.', 'We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. The Green to Wear 2.0 standard aims to minimize the environmental impact of textile manufacturing. To do this, we have developed Inditex’s The List program which helps us guarantee both the purity of production processes and the health and safety of our garments. ', '48% viscose · 33% lyocell · 14% wool · 5% elastane', 'Lower temperature washes and delicate spin cycles are gentler on garment, helping to maintain the color, shape and structure of the fabric. At the same time it reduces energy consumption that is used in care processes.']

', 'Ecologically grown cotton is grown using natural fertilizers and pesticides.The use of these natural growth methods is more respectful of water and of environmental biodiversity which allows farmers to integrate cotton crops with others that serve as food such as oranges, tomatoes, or turmeric, for example.Additionally, in ecologically grown cotton farms the use of genetically modified seeds is avoided, helping to conserve seed biodiversity and soil fertility.', 'We only use ecologically grown cotton certified by organizations that perform monitoring from raw material through the final product. We are currently working with:Organic Content Standard (OCS)Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS)', 'We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products. The Green to Wear 2.0 standard aims to minimize the environmental impact of textile manufacturing. To do this, we have developed Inditex’s The List program which helps us guarantee both the purity of production processes and the health and safety of our garments. ', '100% cotton', 'Lower temperature washes and delicate spin cycles are gentler on garment, helping to maintain the color, shape and structure of the fabric. At the same time it reduces energy consumption that is used in care processes.']

composition: ['Care for fiber: at least 25% recycled polyamide.We use the Join Life label for items that have been produced using technologies and raw materials that help us reduce the environmental impact of our products. ', 'Recycled polyamide is produced from reclaimed fishing nets and nylon garments. They are classified and shredded. Once shredded, the polyamide fibers are reclaimed and processed to create new recycled polyamide thread. As such, we are able to reclaim plastic waist and reduce the consumption of virgin raw material.Additionally, the production process uses less water, less energy, and generates less waste, helping us conserve the environment.', 'We only use recycled polyamide certified by organizations that perform monitoring from origin through the final product. We are currently working with:Global Recycled Standard (GRS)Recycled Content Standard (RCS)', 'We work with monitoring programs to guarantee compliance with the health, safety, and quality standards for our products.
